description: Try our easy to follow Malay Beef Rendang recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rendang curry,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Tomato,Dairy free,Slow cooked
name: Malay Beef Rendang Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium saucepan, add rendang paste, spices and lime leaves and cook, stirring, over medium heat for 3 minutes or until fragrant.

Add beef and stir to coat. Add coconut milk, tamarind pur√©e and 1 tsp salt and stir well to combine. Bring to the boil, then reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 11/2 hours or until beef is tender and gravy is thick. Serve with steamed rice and kachumber salad.
